Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0132 affecting package nvidia-container-toolkit for versions less than 1.16.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0132 affecting package nvidia-container-toolkit for versions less than 1.16.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nvidia-container-toolkit is earlier than 1.16.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-0132
